dataPoints.rawContent: The German Bundestag today passed a new law aimed at accelerating the visa process for skilled workers, with officials hoping to reduce average processing times by up to 25% starting next quarter.

processedData.summary: A new German law may reduce visa processing times for skilled workers by approximately 25% in the near future.

dataPoints.rawContent: Subject: Your I-20 Form Has Shipped! Tracking Number: 1Z9999W99999999999. Dear [User Name], We are pleased to inform you that your Form I-20 has been shipped via UPS Next Day Air and is scheduled to arrive tomorrow, September 18th.

processedData.summary: User's I-20 form is arriving much earlier than the typical 14-day estimate.

proposal.reason: Email confirmation with a tracking number indicates the I-20 will be received tomorrow, completing this step 10 days ahead of schedule.

downstreamImpact.reason: Can be started as soon as I-20 is received.
Timeline can be moved up due to early completion of a dependency.
